overview:
Rosanita Ratcliff is a director of a social incubator. She and her board choose organizations to help grow and provide them with resources necessary to that growth.

She is a micro-philanthropist who decided to document a year of giving in honor of the 30th anniversary of her first open heart surgery. She is investing small amounts in social enterprises and projects that benefit others and is also helping to raise awareness of those ventures.

Ms. Ratcliff enjoys reading about new startups and the people who assist them.
